resources.string: Being underweight can indicate a lack of essential nutrients and may lead to weakened immunity and muscle loss.

string-array.name: bmi_underweight_tips
string-array.item: Consult a healthcare professional for guidance on a balanced diet tailored to your needs.
Incorporate strength training exercises to build muscle mass.
Aim for regular meals and snacks to increase calorie intake in a healthy way.

resources.string: Congratulations! You\'re in a healthy weight range, which lowers the risk of various health issues.

string-array.name: bmi_normal_tips
string-array.item: Maintain your balanced diet and exercise routine to stay in this category.
Continue monitoring your health with regular check-ups.
Focus on maintaining a healthy lifestyle that includes physical activity and a nutritious diet.

resources.string: Being overweight increases the risk of health problems such as heart disease, diabetes, and high blood pressure.

string-array.name: bmi_overweight_tips
string-array.item: Gradually incorporate healthier eating habits and portion control.
Engage in regular physical activity to aid weight loss and improve overall health.
Seek support from a registered dietitian or healthcare professional for personalized advice.

resources.string: Obesity is associated with severe health risks, including increased chances of heart disease, stroke, and certain cancers.

string-array.name: bmi_obese_tips
string-array.item: Consult a healthcare provider for a comprehensive weight management plan.
Focus on reducing calorie intake and increasing physical activity.
Consider support groups or counseling to address emotional aspects of weight management.
